message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into en
data:
References

URL:

http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population

https://www.unfpa.org/data

References:

World Fertility Data 2017 (POP/DB/Fert/Rev2017), United Nations Publication, publicly accessible at http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/publications/dataset/fertility/wfd2017.shtml.

World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, DVD Edition United Nations Publication, accessible at http://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp.

World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, Methodology of the United Nations Population Estimates and Projections, Working Paper No. ESA/P/WP.250, United Nations Publication, available at https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Publications/Files/WPP2017_Methodology.pdf.

Handbook on Indicators for Monitoring the Millennium Development Goals, United Nations, accessible at http://mdgs.un.org/unsd/mi/wiki/MainPage.ashx

Handbook on the Collection of Fertility and Mortality Data, United Nations Publication, Sales No. E.03.XVII.11, available at http://unstats.un.org/unsd/publication/SeriesF/SeriesF_92E.pdf.

Manual X: Indirect Techniques for Demographic Estimation, United Nations Publication, Sales No. E.83.XIII.2, available at http://www.un.org/esa/population/publications/Manual_X/Manual_X.htm.

Indicator and Monitoring Framework for the Global Strategy for Women’s, Children’s and Adolescents’ Health (2016-2030), available at: http://www.everywomaneverychild.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/EWEC_INDICATOR_MONITORING_FRAMEWORK_2016-1.pdf.
